section.name: Welcome to Singularity
section.p: Singularity is an open source project dedicated to developing and promoting RFID middleware technology for use in supply chain management and the EPCglobal Network™. Singularity has two major components, the Middleware and EPC Information Service (EPC-IS).

Singularity envisions an open source EPC-IS that is compliant with the EPCglobal™ specification, as well as enables successful integration of EPC related information into the enterprise. The technology platform chosen for singularity is Java™ as it can be introduced into almost any corporate infrastructure.

The reason for Singularity is to accelerate the evolution and adoption of RFID solutions. RFID Middleware and EPC-IS provides a platform that reduces entrance barriers, as well as provides a base to allow commercial companies to accelerate their product offerings. The open source approach, utilizing the Apache 2.0 license, enables end users, as well as commercial vendors, to effectively introduce RFID enabled supply chain management solutions into the enterprise.
